question: The group reagent <katex>$\text{NH}_4\text{Cl}(s)$</katex> and aqueous <katex>$\text{NH}_3$</katex> will precipitate which of the following ion?
explanation: <katex>$\text{NH}_4\text{Cl}$</katex> and <katex>$\text{NH}_4\text{OH}$</katex> are group reagents for Group III cations, which include <katex>$\text{Al}^{3+}, \text{Fe}^{3+}, \text{Cr}^{3+}$</katex>.
